meanings.definition: A secondary title or explanatory caption displayed below the main title of a movie, book, or other work.
meanings.sent1: The subtitle of the movie helped viewers understand the plot better.
meanings.sent2: I always read the subtitle of a book to get an idea of what it's about.
meanings.sent3: The subtitle of the book was so long, it almost became the main title!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a subtitle to her true feelings, hidden beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The subtitle, like a secret message, revealed the hidden meaning of the story.

meanings.definition: A printed translation of the dialogue of a foreign-language film shown at the bottom of the screen.
meanings.sent1: I prefer watching foreign films with subtitle translations to understand the dialogue.
meanings.sent2: The subtitle at the bottom of the screen made it easier to follow the movie's conversation.
meanings.sent3: The subtitle was so tiny, it felt like reading a secret code at the cinema.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a subtitle, translating the joy of the moment for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The subtitle, like a helpful guide, led me through the unfamiliar language of the film.
